thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Mrs Margaret Diamond
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Mrs Margaret Diamond

author: Mrs Margaret Diamond
title: Mrs Margaret Diamond
text: This is the second time I have ordered from Life Style Sports and have been very happy with the purchases. These are items that I could not find in the US and service was wonderful and delivery prompt. I will be ordering from them again.
